â°Starting February 8th, for every purchase of 2 items at ZERO& stores, including any one of the following: â€œOrange Bliss Milk Tea,â€ â€œOrange Zest Green Tea,â€ or â€œStrawberry Red Velvet Mini Box Cake,â€ you will receive one free red envelope.

caption:
Happy New Year 2024! We are incredibly thankful for everyoneâ€™s support over the past year! One question that has often come up is: why does ZERO& have a variety of new fruit tea products, but not a lot of milk tea? This is indeed related to our focus on innovation in the fruit tea category. However, we have always hoped to make a breakthrough in the traditinal milk tea category, offering something different from whatâ€™s available in the market. So, our R&D team dedicated a significant amount of time to explore and test various teas and alternative dairy options, and the entire development process took nearly half a year.

Finally, at the beginning of this new year, we are thrilled to share our brand-new â€œCoconut Light Milk Tea Seriesâ€ with all of you!

Carefully selected high-quality tea base, paired with our healthy signature coconut milk, presents a more balanced fusion of tea and milk flavors. You no longer have to worry about the heaviness and excessive sweetness of traditional milk tea. Enjoy the refreshing coconut aroma and the pure tea essence, without concerns about lactose intoleranceğŸ™Œ.

We will be launching two flavors initially:
ğŸ‘White Peach Coconut Light Milk Tea
ğŸŒ±Osmanthus Coconut Light Milk Tea

In the next two months, we have even more new light milk tea products with unique tea flavors coming online. Stay tuned! ğŸ˜Š As we welcome the new year, we hope you join us in exploring the new experience of the â€œCoconut Light Milk Teaâ€ series! ğŸ‘Š

caption: Say goodbye to the iconic Korean garlic bread and discover the delight of our Sweet Corn Garlic Bread!
